subject: JUnit Load Test Extensions
msgSnippet: Hi, I tested (finally) the JUnit Load Testing extensions & I was wandering What the problem is with the machine. I created aPerson & anAdress class. Both are
messageBody:
Hi,

I tested (finally) the JUnit Load Testing extensions & I was wandering What the problem is with the machine. I created aPerson & anAdress class. Both are fine with respect to behavior
(files are accessible here http://lautre.org/tsmets/java/tmp/Load.zip, because I recompiled the Loadtester to fit under the junit.load package).

There's however a weird thing when it come to running the test under heavy time constraints - I mean close to the minimum time.

GC occurs permanently & though after about 85 runs the program does one much longer run before going on at the previous speed.

Tx for any hints on what really occured.

Thomas,
